unnormalised: Ani, konnem mhojek health identifiers vixim vicharlem. Tem khoreponnim amchea familinche kaim vorsam adim cholun ghelem. Mhoji aai, Asha Devi, hika medical emergency aili, ani insurance kagdipatram samballop ek sopon zalem. Amche kodden tichi health insurance policy number aslo, zo dekhnnek "HD1234567890" bhaxen dista aslo, ticho Aadhaar number "XXXX-YYYY-ZZZZ" aslo, ani magir hospitalak ticho Unique Health Identification (UHID) number zai aslo, zo mhaka ugddas asa, to "MH" pasun suru zalo ani magir lamb digit-anchi porompora asli. Amkam dista aslem ki ami ankdeanchea udkant budon voitanv mhunn!
normalised: Dekh, konnem mhaka arogya olkhanchi babat vicharle. Tech khorench amchea ghorkarank kaim vorsam adim ghoddlem. Mhoji aai, Asha Devi, hinka ek vaidyakiye aapatkaalin sthiti aili, ani bimaache kagadpatrak doryantlean vat sodunk lagle. Amche kodden tichem arogya bima dhoronnacho ankdo aslo zo dista taso yaadruchik aksharancho ek dhago aslo je H-D ek don tin char panch so sat aath nau shunya, tacho Aadhaar ankdo zo X-X-X-X dash Y-Y-Y-Y dash Z-Z-Z-Z, ani magir hospitalak ticho Unique Health Identification (U-H-I-D) ankdo zai aslo, zo, mhojea yaadepromann, M-H pasun suru zatalo ani magir ankdeanchi lamb sari astali. Amkam dislem ami ankdeanchea doryant budonk laglam mhonn!

unnormalised: Hospitalchea registration desk-ak vegvegllea ID-anchi zaroor asli, ani dor eklea ID-ak vegveglle porinnam disle. Amchea kodden tichem purannem insurance card aslem, zachi expiry tarik 07/2023 asli, punn tankam update kel'le policy details zai asle, je, nischit rupan, hanv mhaje lagim ghevn gelelo na. Tannim ticho CGHS card asa kai mhunnui vicharlem kiteak ti retire zal'li sarkari teacher asli, punn taka ek veglo registration number aslo – "CGHS/DL/12345" sarkhem kain. Dor ek system ekmekank tuttun gel'li dista asli!
normalised: Hospitalachea nondnni deskak veg-veglle I-D zai asle, ani dor ek veg-veglea hetuk lagun distale. Amchea kodden tichem junem bima patrak july don hazar teisak sompta te tariik asali, punn tankam navin dhoronnachi mahiti zai asli ji, khoimchea mhaka gheun vochunk nasli. Tannim vicharlem tiche kodden C-G-H-S patrak asa kai kiteak ti nivritt sarkari shikshika, punn tacho veglo nondnni ankdo aslo – je C-G-H-S slash D-L slash ek don tin char panch aso. Dor ek paddhati itli tutteli distali!

unnormalised: Mhaka ugddas asa ki clerk-an vicharlem, "Madamji, tumcho Central Govt. Health Scheme card no. kitem?" ani magir to ek systemant ghalta aslo, zo health insurance systemak ulo dita aslo na. Tem trasdaik aslem kiteak hem sogllem ghoddta aslem ten'na mhaje aaiik turant medical madadichi zaroor asli. Mhaka dislem, tankam fakt ticho Aadhaar number "XXXX-YYYY-ZZZZ" vaprun tichea healthcare vixim soglli mahiti kaddunk zainasli?
normalised: Mhaka sarkem yaad asa clerk vichartalo, "Madamji, tumcho Central Government Health Scheme card ankdo kitem?" ani magir te paddhatint ghalunk laglo ji arogya bima paddhatik ulounk nasli. Tem trasdaayak aslem kiteak hem sogllem ghoddta astana moje aai-k turunta vaidyakiye dev-ghevk zai asli. Mhozo hetu, tannim ticho Aadhaar ankdo X-X-X-X dash Y-Y-Y-Y dash Z-Z-Z-Z vaprunk ani tichi sogli mahatvachi arogya sambhallachi mahiti kiteak kaddunk zaina?

unnormalised: Uprant mhaka koll'llem ki Bharotant ek chodd ekvottit health ID system toyar korpache praytn choltat, Ayushman Bharat Health Account (ABHA) ID sarkhem kain. Hanvem tantunt kholaien liponk na, punn idea ashi asa ki tuje soglle health records eka ID kodden zoddunk zata mhunn. Khellnnek, tem familanchi tashi poristhitin aslolea lokanchi soppe kortolem, konnakuch "HD1234567890", "CGHS/DL/12345", ani UHID sarkhea multiple health identifiers-anchem dongor ekach vellar choloit ravonk poddchina.
normalised: Mhaka magir koll'lem ki Bharatant ek jut'taichem arogya I-D paddhati toyar korpak prayatn choltat, je Ayushman Bharat Health Account (A-B-H-A) I-D sarkem. Hanvem tantunt kholayen polleunk na, punn vichar asa tujo sogllo arogya nond ekloch I-D-ak jodpak. Aasha asa, tem tosle poristithint ghorkarank sope kortolem, mhonn konnakuch veg-veglle arogya olkhanchi zobabdari gheunk poddchina je H-D ek don tin char panch so sat aath nau shunya, C-G-H-S slash D-L slash ek don tin char panch, ani U-H-I-Ds ekach vellar sanktant.

unnormalised: Khoreponnim, he identifiers-anchem streamlining kelear khub foll ditolem, khas korun mhoje aai, Asha Devi sarkhea senior citizens khatir. Amkam ek system zai, ji bureaucratic hurdlek poros rogi sevaik mahatv dita. Hanv khoreponnim umed dhorun asa ki sarkar he porikriyechi sarollta korunk chodd lokx ditolem.
normalised: Khorench, hi olkhani padhdot sudharleari ghoddnnuk bori zateli, khas korun senior nagrikan khatir je mhoji aai, Asha Devi. Amkam ek paddhat zai ji rogyache dekhbhallek sarkari addchonne poros mahatv divpak zai. Hanv khorench aasha kortam sorkar hi paddhat soglleank sope korpak chodd loksh divtolo.
